title: The Algebra of Vectors - From Zero to Geo 1.4

media:group.media:title: The Algebra of Vectors - From Zero to Geo 1.4
media:group.media:description:
While we have been naming some of the operations on vectors after operations on numbers, how far do these similarities go?  In this video, we go over many of the proofs of algebraic properties of vectors, showing that they do act in a similar way to numbers.

This video is a part of "From Zero to Geo", a series where we formulate geometric algebra, an incredibly powerful branch of mathematics, from the ground up.  Full playlist here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLVuwZXwFua-0Ks3rRS4tIkswgUmDLqqRy
Next video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O40hzr71N0w

Discord: https://discord.gg/3Zj59zA2Rg

14:56 Multiplicative Identity
